title: Beet Salad with Blood Orange Balsamic Vinaigrette

ingredients.content: 28 oz red beets, sliced into half-moons (¼ in.)
1 blood orange, sliced into rounds (¼ in.)
10 oz beet greens, washed, trimmed, cut into strips (½ in.), plus extra, uncut, to garnish

preparations.content: Place a pitcher onto mixing bowl lid, weigh in olive oil and set aside.
Place shallots and garlic into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.

Add orange juice, vinegar, honey, salt and pepper and mix <b>2 min/speed 4<b> while slowly pouring reserved olive oil onto mixing bowl lid, letting it drizzle around measuring cup in a thin stream onto rotating blades to create an emulsion. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place water into mixing bowl. Place Varoma into position, weigh in beets, top with orange slices and thyme sprigs, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>20 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>.

Transfer steamed beets and orange slices into a large bowl. Add beet green strips and toss with reserved vinaigrette, to taste. Serve warm over whole beet greens and garnished with crumbled goat cheese and toasted hazelnuts.

hintsAndTricks: Replace beet greens with Swiss chard.
Replace blood oranges with any sweet winter citrus.
